headline: Invesco Ltd. to Participate in the Goldman Sachs 2025 Financial Services Conference
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, announced today that Andrew Schlossberg, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Allison Dukes, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the Goldman Sachs 2025 Financial Services Conference on December 9, 2025, at 3:40 p.m. ET.

headline: Why has Invesco’s QQQ called me two dozen times in the past few weeks? Is it a scam?
summary: There’s a proxy vote to change the fund, and the calls will keep coming until the matter is settled.

headline: Invesco Releases 2026 Investment Outlook "Resilience and Rebalancing"
summary: Invesco today released its 2026 Investment Outlook with insights on expectations for global markets and asset implications. The Outlook from Invesco's Strategy & Insights group anticipates global stocks to rise further, continued interest rate cuts in the U.S., and fiscal support across Europe, Japan, and China.

headline: Affiliated Managers (AMG) Up 5.9% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
